Replace.Text: Citizens can improve mountain tiles, mountains provide +2 [ICON_Production] production, frozen soil and snow have the same output as plains (tundra provides +1 [ICON_Production] production, snow provides +1 [ICON_Production] production +1 [ICON_Food] food). Non-wonder buildings with [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writing or [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music slots give +1 charm to the city's plot.

The recruited rock band initially has the [ICON_Promotion] promotion of religious rock, and it only takes half the usual time to build the Holy Land and Theater Square area. Has an additional unique unit, Priest Priest, replacing Guru.

The tavern provides an additional [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] relic slot, and the city where the tavern is located has +20% [ICON_Faith] Faith. Has an additional unique unit, the Sister of the Crown of Thorns, which replaces the Inquisitor.
Provides additional recovery to nearby units within 1 cell. Units adjacent to the praying priest have +15 [ICON_Religion] religious combat power.
If the Sister of the Crown of Thorns dies in a Theology battle, a relic will spawn. +10 [ICON_Religion] Religious Combat Power when fighting Theological Combat in the country's borders.
